This link should have every part, including the Stage

I haven‚Äôt yet compiled all the flat patterns, but we are building all the REV field elements and I am planning on posting all our flat packs in the next few days.
For material we are using roughly 40 sheets of 1/2" OSB and some 2x4s. I have no count of the 2x4s because we are probably adding some extra structure inside our elements, and we are reusing scraps.

1 sheet of 1/2" plywood (osb) per AMP
6-7 sheets of ply per Speaker (our patterns are 12 for 2)
13 sheets of ply for the stages (I think, but we haven‚Äôt started cutting and my count could be bad)

We have finished flat packing the CNC field!

REV CNC Field Flat Packs Field Building
We have finally finished flat packing all the REV field elements into 4‚Äôx8‚Äô sheets for cutting, and I wanted to release the flat packs for anyone else who might be cutting them. A full field requires 40 sheets of 1/2" OSB or plywood (I‚Äôd recommend OSB), 1 per Amp, 6 per Speaker, and 13 per stage. We packed 2 speakers together into 12 sheets, so anyone making a single speaker would need to re nest and might need 7 sheets. The Speaker and Amp are step files, the stage is 1 dxf file per sheet. Hap‚Ä¶
